comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: MachineGam on January 28, 2023, 08:17:57 PMLoan Amount: 0.002 BTCReason for Taking out a Loan: TradingAmount to be repaid:0.0022 btcRepayment Date: 31/01/2023Bitcoin Address: 3NEabgbcpYWLV9QnGGcZPmUNEKSpYkPqNfWith the short history on the forum, I am sorry, no one will show any interest to give you money without a collateral. But still good luck.

comments.author: franckuestein
comments.body: Collateral?Quote from: DiamondCardz on April 20, 2014, 02:40:54 PMThe rule of "No Collateral, No Loan" means that in order to get a loan you must give collateral that is equal, or preferably higher to the amount you are being loaned.If you completely ignore this sticky and make a loan request with no collateral, without having massive trust on the forum, the chances of you getting negative trusted feedback and therefore having a Trade with Extreme Caution tag is almost 100%.If there's no collateral and someone wants to proceed, please check MachineGam Trust summary before sending BTC. Clear red flag.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Quote from: MachineGam on January 30, 2023, 02:59:03 AMLoan Amount: 0.002 BTCReason for Taking out a Loan: TradingAmount to be repaid:0.0022 btcRepayment Date: 31/01/2023Bitcoin Address: 3NEabgbcpYWLV9QnGGcZPmUNEKSpYkPqNfSomeone can help me I have paid one loan trustolyThere is no track of this loan repaid... but in any case is pretty useless since you need to provide now for this loan A VALID COLLATERAL. If you don't have it, please state it clearly.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: MachineGam on January 30, 2023, 02:59:03 AMLoan Amount: 0.002 BTCI have paid one loan trustolyThat wasn't a non-collateral loan. The loan was collateral and that's why you gave the repayment. But there is no proof and I cat believe that you may give the repayment of a loan collateral loan. If you really need the loan then you could ask for collateral again and again or you could sell the collateral.Quote from: bitbollo on January 30, 2023, 08:24:34 PMThere is no track of this loan repaidOp repaid a loan to me but that loan was given by taking collateral.
